name: Simple Horror Game
description:
The simplest game that was made as a joke. The game was made on RPG Maker MV. The game boasts an interesting and fascinating plot, a variety of characters, exciting endings.

Endings: 6

Languages:
PC: English/Russian
Android: English

--- Controls ---
PC:
WASD/Mouse/Arrows - Walk
Space/Enter - Interact
Escape - Menu

Android:
Touch Screen - Walk 
Two Fingers - Menu

Gamepad:
Left Stick and D-pad - Run
A - Interact
X - Walk
Y - Menu

Developers:
SmileyWorld
Dunker961

Some MIDIs were used from vgmusic.com
